title: 8Dio - Adagietto [KONTAKT]
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: Adagietto
Vendor: 8Dio
Format: Kontakt 5.3
Website: 8dio.com/instrument/adagietto

ADAGIETTO is a powerful, easy-to-use, full string ensemble set based on our deep-sampled and highly expressive Adagio String Series.

Produced by Academy Award, TEC and G.A.N.G Award Winning Composer, Troels Folmann and Emmy nominated composer and orchestrator, Colin OÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Malley,  8Dio Adagio String Series is the definitive collection of deep-sampled emotional strings ever created.

Adagietto is bread-and-butter of Adagio. It just works. No hassle. Play and Go. Everything is neatly laid out as full ensemble patches, so you can just start composing. The new three-way legato system is based on your velocity (Slur Legato, Normal Legato and Fast Legato).

=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt 5.3 (and above)

--- [ METHOD I ] ---

- Open Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

--- [ METHOD II ] ---

- Go to Library tab
- Click Add Library
- Browse for the library folder's location
- Click Ok/Yes
- Accept or Yes when asked

=======[ Extra ]=====================================================================

I DO NOT OWN THIS PRODUCT - IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING TO SUPPORT OWNER!
